channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Ukraine Never Turned Down a Survivable Deal
item.description: What we know about the negotiations suggests that there was never a deal on the table that would have left Ukraine secure from Russian conquest.

item.title: It’s Time for the Supreme Court to Stop Censorship in Science and Medicine

item.title: Government deficit rose 4% in Trump’s first full month in office, despite DOGE. UBS says the U.S. is slashing confidence, not spending
item.description: While the government did cut its outlays in February the budget deficit for the month more than doubled compared to January due to a drop in income.

item.title: Apple shares are losing haven allure as headwinds deter bulls
item.description: The Nasdaq 100 Index is down 7% in 2025, and Apple is responsible for nearly a fifth of that decline, according to data compiled by Bloomberg.

item.title: 'This is no drill': China's dominance over US shipbuilding sparks bipartisan effort
item.description: A bill aimed at revitalizing the U.S. maritime industrial base is hitting Congress this week.

item.title: Modeling Climate Risk in a Changing World
item.description: Modeling climate risk remains one of the most challenging endeavors in risk management today.

item.title: Ferris Bueller Never Would Have Made It Past Today’s Obsessive Location Sharing
item.description: The world shouldn’t be a panopticon, especially since the last time I checked, this is still America.

item.title: Dr. Marty Makary advances out of key committee in bid for FDA confirmation
item.description: President Donald Trump's nominee to lead the Food and Drug Administration (FDA), Dr. Marty Makary, passed a key committee vote on Thursday morning.

item.title: Will TikTok’s new parental control features really work?
item.description: "TikTok must think that every parent is just a complete idiot," said Titania Jordan in a new Instagram reel.

item.title: Notre Dame, Back to Life After the 2019 Fire
item.description: The restoration is a technical triumph, but the cathedral is as much Gothic Revival as Gothic.

item.title: OpenAI points to China as reason why it should escape copyright rules and state-level AI bills in the U.S.
item.description: Sam Altman's outfit argues that the U.S. will lose its AI lead if it doesn't make life easier for companies like his.

item.title: Decades in a Week: Germany’s Fiscal Breakthrough and Its Global Impact
item.description: Does Germany's massive fiscal package mark the beginning of a lasting regime change or just another chapter in market volatility?

item.title: Are You Investing in a Fad or a Future Market Leader?
item.description: By classifying products into commodity, luxury, or hybrid models, investors can identify durable competitive advantages.

item.title: 6 Reasons to Avoid Hedge Funds
item.description: Financial success depends on disciplined saving and investing, not fancy investment products and high returns.

item.description: The actress is a proud Israeli Jew, and she doesn’t care that some people have a problem with that.

item.description: Alimentation Couche-Tard says it is determined to acquire Seven & i Holdings, even after its offer was rejected.
